static link.name: Static Link
static link.desc: Flourishing or uppercutting an enemy creates a static link between you and your enemy.

static allure.name: Static Allure
static allure.desc: Having two active tethers will cause the previous tethered enemy to get magnetized to your newest tethered enemy, also increases the duration of tethers by 15 seconds.

static ace.name: Static Ace
static ace.desc: Using Lightning Stream with an active tether targets your closest active link.

jumper cables.name: Jumper Cables
jumper cables.desc: Getting knocked with an active tether allows you to steal health from tethered targets and not get knocked.

link conduction.name: Link Conduction
link conduction.desc: While you have active tethers your lightning mantras cost less ether.
